1370: Wauthem was born in St. Ians straet in 1370.
1372: Lost sibling Berta in 1372 when Berta was 2.
1376: Lost mother at the age of 6.
Willekine took care of Wauthem since Wauthem was 7.
1378: Lost sibling Conzone in 1378 when Conzone was 6.
1390: Lost father at the age of 20.
1393: Got married to Wendelmodis at age 24 in 1393.
Wauthem moved to Bloemendaelse straet.B.13 after marriage.
1395: Had a son with Wendelmodis, Brandekijn, at age 25.
1396: Lost daughter Hersewindis when Hersewindis was 0 years old.
Lost his wife Wendelmodis and their daughter Hersewindis  while Wendelmodis was giving birth when he was 26.
Became caretaker of Brandekijn at age 27.
Got married a second time to Aleberna at age 27 in 1396.
Had Aleberna move in at Bloemendaelse straet.B.13 after marriage.
1398: Had a son with Aleberna, Ioris, at age 28.
